ing: 1/2 fluid ounce coffee liqueur, such as Kahlua
des: "I had this cocktail with a friend. We used up what booze he had."
ins: Pour the Jagermeister, coffee liqueur, schnapps, cranberry juice, and tomato juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a small rocks glass to serve.
